question: Question_04_(c)
statement:
Consider the Fourier series

\[t^2 - t = \sum_{n = -\infty}^\infty c_ne^{2\pi int}\]

for $0 \leq t \leq 1$.

\textbf{(c)} Compute the coefficient \emph{c\textsubscript{0}}.
hints:
Simply plug in \emph{n = 0} in your formula for
\emph{c\textsubscript{n}} from
\href{Science:Math_Exam_Resources/Courses/MATH307/December_2012/Question_04_(b)}{part
(b)}.
